title: Vuelta a España stage 15: Rui Costa comes top in breakaway sprint, Sepp Kuss cruises in red
content:
Costa gets the better of Kämna and Buitrago in cagey final, no worries for Jumbo-Visma in final stage before rest day.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 15: Rui Costa comes top in breakaway sprint, Sepp Kuss cruises in red on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
